label: PAT02-C
info_overview: The flood multisensor PAT02 has flood sensor, based on Z-WaveTM technology.
info_inclusion: Pressing the tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the inclusion mode
info_exclusion: Pressing tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the exclusion mode
info_wakeup: Press the tamper key once. The device will wake-up 10 seconds

parameters.label: Basic Set OFF Level
parameters.overview:
• Setting the BASIC command value
    • When the flood trigger off(0x00), send the BASIC CC to the group 2.

parameters.label: Basic Set ON Level
parameters.overview:
• Setting the BASIC command value
    • When the flood trigger on(0xFF), send the BASIC CC to the group 2.

parameters.label: Operation Mode
parameters.description: Operation mode. Using bit to control.
parameters.overview:
Operation mode. Using bit to control.

  • Bit0: Disable the Flood function.
  • Bit1: Reserve.
  • Bit2: Reserve.
  • Bit3: not applicable for this device variant, set to 0
  • Bit4: Reserve.
  • Bit5: not applicable for this device variant, set to 1
  • Bit6: Reserve.
  • Bit7: Reserve.

parameters.label: Customer Function
parameters.description: Parameter to set the sensor functions
parameters.overview:
Customer Function switch using bit control

  • Bit 0: Reserve
  • Bit 1: Reserve
  • Bit 2: Reserve
  • Bit 3: Disable send out BASI OFF after flood event cleared
    • 0: Enable
    • 1: Disable
  • Bit 4: Notification Type
    • 0: Using Notification Report
    • 1: Using Sensor Binary Report
  • Bit 5: Disable Multi CC in auto report
    • 0: Enable
    • 1: Disable
  • Bit 6: Disable to report Battery state when the device triggered
    • 0: Enable
    • 1: Disable
  • Bit 7: Reserve

parameters.label: Auto Report Battery Time
parameters.description: The interval time for auto report the battery level.
parameters.overview:
The interval time for auto report the battery level.

0 means turn off auto report. The default value is 12. The tick time can setting by the configuration No.20.

parameters.label: Auto Report Flood Time
parameters.description: The interval time for auto report the flood state.
parameters.overview:
The interval time for auto report the flood state.

0 means turn off auto report. The default value is 12. The tick time can setting by the configuration No.20.

parameters.label: Auto Report Tick Interval
parameters.description: The interval time for auto reporting each tick.
parameters.overview:
The interval time for auto report each tick.

Setting this configuration will effect configuration No.10, No.13, No.14 and No.15.

Units of one minute.

Caution1: Setting to 0 means turn off all auto report function.

Caution2: The value is unsigned byte

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.
